name: BenQ W2700 4K Projector for Home Theatre with HDR-PRO, DLP, UHD, DCI-P3, Lens Shift
description: True 4K UHD Resolution: 8.3 million Pixels give awe-inspiring 3840 x 2160 image quality and deliver incredible clarity and crisply defined details
Grand Cinematic Enjoyment: CinematicColor technology reproduces out-of-the-box Rec.709/DCI-P3 colour accuracy and offers super wide DCI-P3 colour space (digital cinema colour)
Projector-Optimized HDR: HDR-Pro technology supercharged by HDR10 and HLG support with exclusive enhanced HDR colour rendition and cinema-optimized contrast
Installation Flexibility: Vertical lens shift (Â±5 percent) and short throw with 1.3x big zoom lens enables more flexible to be set up even with limited space
Unparalleled Audiovisual experience: BenQ CinemaMaster Video+ and Audio+2 technology with 10W stereo speakers turn any room into a world-class home theatre
summary: This product has been professionally inspected and tested by Amazon-qualified suppliers. The product may have minimal scratches or dents, and a battery with at least 80% capacity. Box may be generic and accessories may not be original, but will be compatible and fully functional. This product is eligible for a replacement or refund within 1 year of receipt if you are not satisfied
